title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS bindings to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama—stream chat, generate completions, pull/embed models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings; chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete models via local Ollama server.

title: jmorganca/ollama
summary: PyPI landing page for the official ollama Python package showing version history, downloads, and quick-start commands.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama as an LLM and embeddings provider for chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama featuring chat history, model switching, markdown, code highlighting.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight NPM package exposing a React hook and CLI to chat with any Ollama model via the local REST API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with synchronous and asynchronous APIs, model management, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping Ollama endpoints for chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete, and embeddings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot-style autocomplete and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, persistent chat sessions, and plugin system written in Go.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for building RAG and semantic search pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models, IAsyncEnumerable streaming, and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate exposing Ollama endpoints via reqwest; includes Tokio streaming, model management, and examples.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama-based chat completions and embeddings views with admin UI and REST endpoints via Django REST Framework.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice template that exposes additional authentication, rate-limiting, and caching layers in front of Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection, autoscaling, and optional web-ui sidecar.

title: ollama-rag
summary: End-to-end RAG starter repo using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + LangChain for PDF question-answering.
